name: Ghost room
description:
Ghost room is a short horror game similar to The Exit 8 and I'm on Observation Duty, in which you suppress all the spiritual phenomena that occur in the room and aim to escape.

Genre: The Exit 8-like horror
Play time: Approximately 60 minutes (estimated time to collect all spiritual phenomena)
Operation method: Keyboard/mouse (controller not supported)
Number of endings: 1
Difficulty: Low

〇 Live commentary is welcome for this game. If you like it, please play it and let us know what you think in the live video!
*Estimated live broadcast time: approximately 60 to 120 minutes
